Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Lelion Way, north of the Lelion Public Works.
Room.LongDescription: The Lelion Public Works station is responsible for the upkeep and continual maintanence of the Lelion public parks and beaches. The Lelion Beach, to the west past Marina Way, is one of the few beach areas in Oceancrest, as the rest are taken up by docks, marinas, or trapped behind the City Walls.
